summary: Three aliens come to Earth to discover the true meaning of Christmas.
cast: Joey Davidson|Martin Lavut|Richard M. Davidson|Duncan Regehr|Patricia Moffatt|Jane Mallett|Marvin Goldhar|Greg Rogers|Chris Wiggins|Nick Nichols|Marian Waldman
director: Director: Clive Smith (as Clive A. Smith)
title: A Cosmic Christmas
